comments.content: Looks like British custom logo design to me.

hey Yves,

are you refering the British connection because of the UK on the image? I found out this type on my recent visit to greece and the quality of the type used on the Bank of Cyprus signs blew me away. So it’s not a British but worldwide thing.

Very nice type, maybe custom, yes.
